ygData.subject: Network setup help
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, I m hoping that someone on this board can help.  I just installed an at home network with an ethernet DSL modem, 2 computers and a LinkSys router (with
ygData.messageBody:
Hi,

I'm hoping that someone on this board can help. I just installed an
at home network with an ethernet DSL modem, 2 computers and a LinkSys
router (with switch built in).

For some reason, the router seems to be making me disconnect from EQ
VERY frequently! 9 or 10 times a night!!

I unplugged the router and just plugged the computer into the modem
and everything worked.

Any suggestions on how I can get this network going?

Ariaya, Ranger
Fariaya, Enchanter
Cariaya, Bard
Wariaya, Beastlord
All on Terris Thule Server
ariaya@...
